website_summaries.verdict: This enormous parachute-fabric beach blanket folds up to almost nothing and gives multiple options for securing to the ground.
pros: Sand easily brushes off the dry nylon parachute fabric
Secure with sand or other weights in corner pockets
cons: Anchor loops can break, especially if you trip over a stake
Does not filter sand like mesh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beach Accessory!
customer_reviews.text: We took our new beach blanket to the beach last night and I was amazed how big it was! I also thought if the ground was wet it would soak through the blanket but it didn't. Once I took it out I thought there is no way this big blanket will fit back in that tiny bag but in second it was all safely tucked back in the bag. The bag is attached to the blanket which is a great idea. There is also an attached zipper pouch which was a nice addition. We are very pleased with this blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Angela V.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Have used multiple times camping. Holding up well with our 2yo human, 3 to 5 canines, and chairs, tables, etc set upon it. Have washed it on gentle mode and dried on clothes line.
customer_reviews.author: Deni F

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE - Garbage after one Wash on Delicate Cycle
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE -- I washed the blanket in cold water without any detergent and the blanket has STAINED in multiple locations. I ran it on delicate cycle...and the threading around the sand pockets and carrying case is starting to come off. Save yourself some money and go with a cheaper beach blanket on Amazon that works the same exact way as this one. This definitely will not last for the long term and at thirty bucks...waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Piyush Patel

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, lightweight, easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time at Huntington Beach. Although it was windy, I had no problem setting it up just using the sand pouches in each corner (i didnt need the stakes). It did not take up a lot of room in my luggage and was very lightweight. The size could easily accommodate four adults. My son is 6’2” and his feet were not hanging over in the sand. I highly recommend, especially if flying to your destination
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We loved it! It was light; it kept cool; and no matter how much wet sand it got on it, sand came off easily. Put it in the washer in delicate. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mleon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I loved using this! Lightweight, easy to unfold and washable!!!! It is so lightweight though that it needs to weighted down , do not use the little pockets for sand though, what a mess! Time consuming to fill and empty with sand! Plus it didn't work that well. Ended up using shoes and bags and toys to hold it down, the slightest wind will carry this thing far away!!! BUT it is a good product to use instead of everyone having to lay a towel down in the sand then try to dry off with their sandy beach towel. I highly recommend it and for the price, why not??
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Lambrecht

customer_reviews.title: Sand doesn't sift through blanket as I thought
customer_reviews.text: It's my mistake that I thought the sand doesn't sift through the blanket as I thought. Instead, it's expected that the wind carries the sand off of the blanket since it's made out of a silky material versus a cotton towel. By the end of our day, there were pockets of sand all over it. I'm not sure we'd go to the beach on a windy day though. Either way, it's much nicer having this rather than big towels that collect more sand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for our family of 4
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is of great quality. We are a family of four and we were all able to fit perfectly. Also it didn’t fly away with the wind when we weren’t laying on it which was a pleasant surprise... My toddler hates sand in his feet, hands or face so this blanket was a huge success. We were all able to enjoy our beach day. I also love that it fits in the little pouch so it is easy to carry and doesn’t take much space. I would recommend the Wellax Beach Blanket to anyone looking for a good quality and reasonably priced product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lysaght

customer_reviews.title: Not sandfree, comes up through material
customer_reviews.text: Never really feel compelled to write reviews but wouldn’t recommend at all! 1) not sand free 2) gets hot on hot sand 3) it gets picked up by the wind so easily because the material is so light
customer_reviews.author: Beach Goer

customer_reviews.title: Buy with caution
customer_reviews.text: For the good reviews I figured this would be worth $40 for a blanket. But sadly, it did not live up to expectations. I would suggest sticking to a typical bedsheet. The material is very light weight but that I would say is the only PRO about it. AS for setting it at the beach, it comes with 4 corner hooks which very easily ripped the fabric with the wind blowing. This is not worth $40 please save your money... Better off reusing old bedsheet believe me
customer_reviews.author: beautyguru

customer_reviews.title: excellent beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: Awesome beach blanket. Large space is easily created. We've only used it by filling the pockets with sand so far. Folding is tough on a windy beach so it takes at least 2 people to mot struggle, but it rids itself of sand instantly and goes right back into its little pouch. This is a thin sheet style blanket, so it wouldn't be as useful in a park in my opinion. Really shines for convenience (to travel with), becoming sand free, and massive size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed! It’s HUGE and was plenty space for our little fam. Was lightweight enough to just throw in the beach bag. We took our puppy to the beach for the first time, and this blanket withstood her taking off to chase a bird... I absolutely expected her nails to make at least one tear, but this blanket is perfectly durable! It got a little windy while we were there, but the stakes held very firm in the sand. Loved the color panels, we got the purple/pink. Folding it up was a 2 person job and so easy to pack back up in the attached bag. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to pack and throw down on the beach
customer_reviews.text: The material is like a parachute, but totally waterproof. Dumped an entire glass of wine on it the first time I used it and it beaded up and rolled off. If it's windy, you definitely need to put sand in the corner pockets as it will take off. But it's a great blanket for the beach. I would think if you wanted to use this on prickly grass, it might not be great as it's very thin material.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING replacement for traditional large beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this years ago. WAY better then those bulky, heavy towels I used to bring to the beach. This product is super light weight and folds into the size of your hand, into a self attached carrying case. PLUS, it includes metal stakes to secure the blanket into the sand and make it windproof. PLUS sand easily brushes right off of it. So in summary, compared to a towel, it's far more compact, won't blow away, and won't have cause sand to stick to it. I love this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Siminoff

customer_reviews.title: By no means is it sand free until you shake it out
customer_reviews.text: This is not a sand free blanket. The claims are false. Waiting last couple months to use- this is just a light weight material. Sand does not pass through it. Would love my money back so could try another claim of sand free.
customer_reviews.author: John Jones

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket before a trip to the beach and was super glad I did! Its light weight but also durable. I love the large size - 4 adults could easily lay on it outstretched while we had 3 little children play in the middle. Loved the pockets for sand to hold it down (came with stakes too - but we stuck with the pockets). Best part was one good shake and all the sand came off - none stuck on or clung like a regular blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah R

customer_reviews.title: Great sized beach blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blanket! Very large in size. Heat resistant! The only reason why I didn’t give it 5 stars: some of the answered questions by the seller/company stated that water would not come through the blanket (wet grass, etc). When I was lying on the blanket, leaning on my elbows, moisture came through those spots, even though we had not gotten any rain for a few days. (And it was not sweat, as it was not a hot day) Otherwise I will be keeping this blanket and can’t wait to use it at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Piasecki

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and large
customer_reviews.text: Great addiction to our beach tent! its very large so we can have it under out tent plus have some piece in front of it so we can minimize the amount of sand we would be bringing inside. Its way too large for one person (obviously) but if you are looking for 1 large beach blanket for a whole family this one is good. Cons: It's a bit difficult to get rid of sand from the pockets, also it's super thin- it will be only be comfortable on top of fine sand or other smooth surfaces. But i's a necessary compromise if you want a lightweight product. Overall I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela.... GO VEGAN!

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket, I used it all summer long. It was super easy to fold and unfold and the pockets for sand were easy to fill and always made the blanket stay in place. The material was a parachute type nylon, which was soft and comfortable to lay on. Just remember its water resistant, not water proof.. so if you put it on wet grass your butt is going to get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Valkyrie

customer_reviews.title: Great for the entire family!
customer_reviews.text: This beach blanket is the best. I would highly recommend it to anyone in need of one. It was easy to pack in a suitcase, unfold/refold and repelled the sand on a windy day in Maui.
customer_reviews.author: Carlissa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beach blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Love this beach blanket so much. Its light weight, easy to store and easy to clean. The sand comes right off when you are done playing at the beach, unlike a towel. I hated bringing my towels back to the car because there was so much sand still stuck in the towel and would make a mess, you know how hard it is to get sand out of the car... ugh. This blanket solves that problem.
customer_reviews.author: AD8677

customer_reviews.title: I had doubts. Now I have massive kudos.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if this purchase would really be worth it. It didn’t cost much so, I took a chance. We took this to Mexico with us to use on the beach. We could easily fit five of us on it and used it everyday. We now use it at home much more than I ever imagined. It goes with us to the beach, pool, park, hiking and camping! We use it all of the time. We may need to replace it after a year of very heavy use but, it has already been worth the purchase and then some. This is a great item at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: HarvyDanger Films

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite amazon purchases! It’s just a well thought out product: the bag is attached to the blanket, it includes stakes to secure it to the ground, it’s water and sand resistant, it’s big enough for a couple people to fit on. If you like going to the beach, but don’t want to bring a chair with you every time, this is a perfect option. Bonus: the colors are beautiful and vibrant
customer_reviews.author: Khristina

customer_reviews.title: One of my better purchases on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love that is it large, lightweight, cool to touch even in full sun. The four sand pockets make setting this up even in 20 MPH winds pretty easy. We got it back on the storage pocket one time but after that we found it easier to fold several times over and then roll it up.
customer_reviews.author: James P Curran

customer_reviews.title: Good product and nice size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family beach trip. It was awesome for the kids and these was enough room for 3 adults with towles a cooler in the corner and for the 3 year old to play. Easy to set up and fold back up in the bag. I don't know about it being water resistant, but it is still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Best beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It performs perfectly at both the beach and park. Sand does not stick to it, it's huge, and incredibly easy to use and fold. The metal stakes are a big plus. It was super windy one day at the beach (enough for people to leave, including myself), and the blanket did not budge! I especially love that it's machine washable. It dries quickly and looks as good as new. You won't regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: KayPh

customer_reviews.title: Not “Sandfree”- Water Proof Picnic blanket more Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This product is more of a parachute material. Disappointed and feeling a bit mislead.. Yes water seemed to bead upon it. However we thought we were purchasing a blanket that allowed sand to shift through it and thus be “sandfree”. We took it to the beach and sand easily crept onto the surface. Most sand shook off when we went to leave, but of course there was still some sand that remained. It would make a good water-proof picnic blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Taber

customer_reviews.title: Great beach blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a regular beach towel when going to the beach. It’s done a great job at that! It is HUGE so there’s a ton of room for more than one person. The fabric is good, it does show sweat and sunscreen, but I’ve been able to wash it out no problem. Great buy for beach relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Nicer for beach than cotton sheet
customer_reviews.text: Good for beach trip. Lots of space - very large. Liked that half of it could be under tent and other half could be in the sun...Lots of space to sit. Rolled up easily. Sand came off easily. Only issue was the stains on it immediately from my sunscreen on my legs. They did not come out in the wash; however, I did not use stain remover. So, now there are spots that look wet although they are just marked from sunscreen. Not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: The Beach Blanket you Need
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our first beach trip of the year. Our son has been to the beach previously but one never knows if their child will like the sand from one year or one visit to the next. This blanket is HUGE! Which is great. It could fit 7 people with extra space. It folds up into it's tiny bag. The sand pockets are great but it also comes with stakes just in case you need them. I didn't test out the water theory but it was easy to get the sand off the blanket and out of the pockets. We'll definitely be using this in the backyard and on our next beach trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked it, did what it was supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this beach/ picnic blanket. I thought at fort it would be hard to fold but it wasn’t And it was big enough to to lay down comfortably. It’s not waterproof but does resist water droplets which was nice, because it didn’t get drenched when I spilled some water on it. The only thing I would say was annoying was that when I washed it some of the color ran off on to other colors. I’ll still use it but only after one wash and the nice colors won’t be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Yemily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!  Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have at the beach! It is so easy to put in attached bag. Has metal stakes to keep it from moving and works great if you place them correctly in the sand. It was big for four of us to lay on plus numerous bags and coolers. Sand can get on blanket but easy to brush off. Made our beach week so pleasant without all that sand on us and our stuff!
customer_reviews.author: DrA

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t leave a complete review as I haven’t used it yet but I will say that the package it comes in is perfect traveling size (has a bag to place it in) and it comes with a plastic carrier for your phone which was a great bonus! It looks and feels secure so that water won’t get through it I’ll be using it on our family vacation June 22 so I’ll update this then!!
customer_reviews.author: geneva

customer_reviews.title: Beach Blanket enhances your day at the Beach
customer_reviews.text: Have to say the blanket exceeded expectations..worked absolutely perfect for our beach needs..sand easily slides off the blanket, the corner pockets filled with sand held the blanket in place all day even with a steady breeze. This is a must buy to meet your beach needs..AAAA+++++..5 stars to boot..
customer_reviews.author: Wolf21

customer_reviews.title: Needed lightweight beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: Preparing for a beach trip and needed a lightweight beach blanket. I hate lugging a bunch of items and this fit the bill. Throw it in a day pack and keep moving. The attached pouch is brilliant. Only gave four stars because I haven’t tested on hot day at beach. But again my desire was portability so I’m extremely satisfied. Just returned from my beach trip. Attached sand pouches are very convenient and held up in windy conditions. Water beaded nicely and easy to remove. Sand came off easily when shaken. Unfortunately the blanket did get hot but it was in the direct sunlight in 90 degree weather. So there’s a limit to the heat resistance. Nevertheless happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT and BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: This is a very BRIGHT and thin blanket, and it made beach strollers stop for a longer glance. I purposely put water and sand on it to see if it was worth it’s price. The water trickled around and the wet sand sifted about. I did not try to sit and wait to watch the wet sand (see if it seeped through the blanket) because it was HOT, so I ran back into the ocean. Be careful with clearing the area as this beach blanket resembles a silk sheet - May be pierced by sharp objects.
customer_reviews.author: Cirrus

customer_reviews.title: Stakes are too small
customer_reviews.text: The Beach Blanket is a great material that does what it says, it’s durable and the sand just brushes right off. I bought it to take to the beach and when the winds kicked in the stakes did not hold down the blanket. They are simply not long enough; the hook barely stays attached to the corners. So, after my second use a stake was gone into the sand and couldn't be found. I bought more heavy duty stakes to use and now it works for me. Yes, I would buy it again, but I'd also buy replacement stakes at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, NOT AS PICTURED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the product that was pictured!!! This doesn't have four CLOSABLE square sandbag pockets ATTACHED to the four corners... It's a silly little open triangle of fabric that is going to spill sand out immediately. The edges were completely frayed all the way around with strings that, if snagged, will unravel this whole thing. I'm returning for a refund. This is poorly made and I doubt it would last. Can't believe I paid so much for this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Facetious_Elise

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with this beach blanket. I can't tell you how many times I've gone to the beach and seen my towels and blankets fly away from the breeze. This blanket came with hooks to help stick into the sand, not once did they come up. The blanket is nice and large, you could comfortably fit 3-4 adults. Very light weight, it was an easy addition to my beach bag. It has a great little pocket in one corner that my kids use to store sea shells. I highly recommend, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Maria Muir

customer_reviews.title: Will get lots of use
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really cool! I love how light weight it is, love the pockets to hold sand/rock or the pins to put in the ground. It’s also HUGE, so that’s exactly what I wanted. My only complaint is the material makes you sweat. Instead of a towel which absorbs moisture this parachute type matierial was causing me sweat where my legs were touching the blanket. Docked a star for that
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bit disappointed with this blanket. The sand doesn't easily filter through the blanket and takes a bit of effort to get it off. The blanket is extremely light weight, however it is a little tricky when folding it back up into the pouch. The blanket comes with stakes that are intended to keep it from flying away, but the stakes can easily be lost in the sand as the loops on the blanket kept slipping off the stakes. On a good end, the blanket is quite roomy and larger than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Saninocencio

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a sandless beach mat.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered in late July for a trip to Hilton Head Island in mid August. I was very disappointed. The sand stayed on the mat and didn't go through the fabric as promised. It is an excellent ground cover for the park, camping, etc. The stakes held the mat down very well even on a very windy day. It is very lightweight and easy to fold. Loved the corner pockets and the attached pouch it all folds into. It is water resistant and the mat dries quickly. It is NOT the "best sand proof picnic mat for travel, etc." I'm going to try the one from Hammacher Schlemmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from using this for a week on beaches in Costa Rica. It was perfect for us. Easy to use, comfortable to lay on, easy to spot when you've gone for a dip in the ocean and need to get back to your spot on the beach, and easy to stuff back in the stuff sack when you're ready to pack up. Don't hesitate to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: SigneO

customer_reviews.title: Sand slides right off!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this on our beach trip! It’s perfect for kids, and we kept our baby playpen on it to keep sand away. Only suggestion I would have would be to add extra loops so it can be secured down while folded in half. There were times we didn’t need the full length but had to put bags on one side to keep it down.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: It looks so expensive but it’s not!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is by far the nicest beach blanket I’ve ever had. It’s super lightweight material and cool to the touch. It comes with stakes but there’s also pockets on the sides that I plan on filling with sand. It’s a little tricky getting back in the bag but not an issue. I haven’t tried it out yet but I’m sure I’ll enjoy it and get plenty of use out of it! I’d definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: excellent for beach use
customer_reviews.text: The large size, light weight, and pockets filled with sand make this an exceptional covering to use on the beach, especially when it's windy. Not so easy to fold back up, but it's so light that it's easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Puck the Reader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for family travel
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this blanket for our Hawaii vacation, as we were going to explore wild beaches. It has proven to be excellent value - large enough to fit 4 people comfortably, and its water repellent qualities let it dry in minutes on the sun. Easy to fold and re-pack, and barely takes any place. BTW, we have seen other family using the same blanket, so it must have been good for others, too!
customer_reviews.author: alexmish

customer_reviews.title: Best beach buy ever! I want a second one!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! YOU NEED ONE! Went to the beach and it works amazing.. sand DOES NOT stick to it... wipes right off.. we were actually laughing at people shaking their towels and blankets and sand going everywhere! the price is great.. hardly weights anything at all a 2 yr old could carry it. brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi P.

customer_reviews.title: All Beach Goers Need One
customer_reviews.text: We recently took this on vacation to Hawaii. This was our first time using it ad LOVE it!!!! Its big enough for several people to sit/lay on and still have room for cooler etc. Each corner has a pocket to use as sand weights to hold the blanket down. I was worried sand wouldn't be enough to hold the blanket down but we didn't have any problems. An added bonus is that it has a pocket to stuff the blanket in that makes it super easy to transport & store. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Best beach blanket ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect blanket for the beach! It will get wet, and probably get you wet if you put it on wet grass or dirt, but I would buy this again in a heartbeat. The sand comes off so easy at the end of the day, and it doesn’t track all over when you walk on it with sandy feet. It’s also super lightweight and folds/scrunches up back into that tiny pouch with minimum effort. Not complicated to put back at all like some other blankets we’ve tried. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J

customer_reviews.title: Be mindful of the 4 stakes that come with it so they don't get lost in the sand on first use.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Wellax Beach Blanket for our trip to Maui. I'm glad we did. It's whale season here and we made some wonderful sightings from the beach aloft our blanket. It performed well using the four corner sand pockets to hold it down on a windy day. It was easy to shakeout and folk back into itself even though the wind was strong. Highly recommend it over scrunching your adult body onto a beach towel. The Wellax Beach Blanket gives you room to spread out without getting too sandy too!! Its lighter to carry to the beach than a chair but you do you.
customer_reviews.author: David dayringer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is the absolute most amazing purchase! It’s shed sand like a breeze. Best purchase for the beach!
customer_reviews.author: camille05

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It’s really big and you can weight down the corners with sand. It is super easy to stuff back in attached pouch and is small for packing! Very happy- disclaimer it is not one of those blankets that sand goes through- sand will collect on top of it
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Years of great use
customer_reviews.text: We recently used this at the beach again and I was reminded that I simply needed to write a glowing review. We have owned this product for over 3 years and have used it many many times when we go to the beach or even just want to picnic in the backyard. It is lightweight, sand completely comes off it easily, it packs back into the bag perfectly, and is big enough for a family of 4 or more to comfortably sit on it and play or simply enjoy the sun and/or a picnic. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca E J Satterlund

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach blanket!
customer_reviews.text: We loved our sand blanket! Quick dry. Easy to set up. Sand just came right off. It has little pockets on the corners they you can just scoop sand into. It comes with stakes, but we didn’t need them.
customer_reviews.author: Dalana

customer_reviews.title: This worked so well! Loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical buying this but I have to say It was wonderful! So easy to set up and fold away. It has sand pockets, which I didn’t use. I used the stakes that come with it. It held it against the wind with just the stakes. The sand would just gather and easily fall off. I love how the bag is attached and easily all folds back together. (I just stuffed it in the bag with ease.) No hassle! Even the water falling off my swim suit would bead up and easily roll off! It is very spacious to lay out on with others as well. I love this product and may order a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Beach Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Good size blanket and easy to carry pouch. I like the thin slick material. I use this for the beach and the sand slides right off. The corner pockets hold a good amount of sand and keep the blanket flat. It also unfolds and goes back in the pouch in seconds, perfect for when you are DONE with the beach and ready to run back to the house. I haven't noticed any sunscreen stains after using it all summer but I try to lay a towel on top before I flop down. Good blanket for my uses especially when a sporting good store will try to charge you twice as much $$$ for something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Schweers

customer_reviews.title: The description of the item was exact.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sheet for a trip to St John, we used it on the beaches and it was excellent, however I packed it away in my suitcase and I don't know if it was still wet I didn't think it was but when I got home it had bled through to some of my clothes packed in my suitcase I'm not sure if the case itself got wet somehow but I had blue dye on some of my shirts that were packed underneath and on top of the sheet , when I took them out of the suitcase. Other than that I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blanket because I was fed up with smaller fabric blankets that always either got wet or held onto the thin sand that our beaches have. The Wellax blanket is lightweight, easy to unpack and fold, and fits into my beach backpack perfectly. You can either use sand or the provided stakes to keep it from blowing in the wind. Love it and would recommend to anyone who frequents the beach.
customer_reviews.author: gielowk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trips!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this blanket because of how small it folds up. We took a family trip to Hawaii and didn’t have a whole lot of room for stuff so this blanket was perfect. It fit really well in my suit case and then while we were over there, it fit perfectly just in my beach bag. It was plenty big for the whole family to sit on and I love how you can just fill up the pockets with sand to anchor it down. It cleaned off beautifully and packed back up easily. I’m so glad we bought it and now have for days at the lake as well. I highly recommend this for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Biking Buggy

customer_reviews.title: Great size beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: This sand free blanket is huge! It's the perfect size for my family of 5 and we can even spread out. The material is similar to the material of the on the go hammocks and is easy to dust off. This blanket is also good for picnics, outdoor movies and other outdoor activities where you need to sit on the ground. It comes with stakes for the grass, which I found super handy.
customer_reviews.author: Shortee231

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: While this blanket provides no padding, it is huge, light, and folds easily. We have been taking it camping and it has been everyone's favorite - from kids, playing on the beach, to adults playing cards, to covering bicycles from the rain - this is a great multitasker!
customer_reviews.author: Nordic Cat

customer_reviews.title: Wellax Beach Blanket - Blue
customer_reviews.text: A Fabulous Perfect Beach Blanket to lay out on the sand near the water, or even on the grass. Seriously it is excellent. It is lightweight, has corner anchors, a bag to store it, and is a very generous size! I Love the color blue I have and the way it has a variety of shades and isn't just one solid color. You can't go wrong with this. It has more of a sheet like nylon feel than a blanket, so remember that. Adding towels or a more terry type blanket on top would be primo! Buy and go enjoy the outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Rinckey

customer_reviews.title: Best beach buy yet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the beach and it was more than worth it! Plenty of room for kids and adults plus it takes up very little room when it's tucked inside its bag. The sand brushes off easily and didn't get too hot in the sun either. I plan to use it for other outdoor events next summer also. Love that it is machine washable--just make sure you put it on gentle cycle. It got caught in my washer the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product over others because I wanted a large blanket for picnics and the beach. Most aren’t big enough for two adults to lay on, let alone with kids. I loved the colors and how easy this blanket is to set up and fold. Pockets and stakes to weight it down are a big plus as well. The blanket is supppper thin so you can feel the ground through it but I don’t mind because sand is soft. And for parks I’ll just bring a second smaller blanket to sit on top if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amira

customer_reviews.title: BEST BEACH BLANKET!!!
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is amazing! It is so lightweight which makes it cool (temp) to lay on. Especially on a hot sandy beach. The sand doesn’t come through and if it gets on the blanket it blows right off...doesn’t stick. It comes with an attached stuff bag and stuffs down into a small bag which is easy to toss into the beach bag. I plan on keeping mine in the Jeep for the kids’ baseball season. Will be great for sitting in the grass or covering the bleacher seats. Hands down definitely recommend this blanket!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beach blanket - GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: Was so happy to receive this beach blanket! Shipping was fast and the quality seems great. The purple/pink color is also very pretty and matches the color in the picture exactly. Can easily fit 4-5 people LAYING OUT on it and easily more if people are just sitting. This is a great value and I know I will use it all summer long. It was also easy to fold back in the bag (bag isn't so tight like other where you have to fold EXACTLY right to get it back in there which I love). Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fast-drying towel
customer_reviews.text: We loved this blanket on our recent trip to Hawaii. It is comfortable to sit on and dries quickly. Easily portable. We lost one stake. It must have fallen out when transporting.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gras

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this! So glad I got it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take on a Hawaii trip. It was amazing to have. It isn’t too heavy to carry around. It unpacks and packs up so easily. (Just shove it back in the attached sack... no neatness required.) It was very windy one day and the sand in the corners held it fine. It would be durable enough to shove rocks in the corner, if needed. The sand just blew right off it. The best part was how it just repelled water. We’d sit on it wet. The water pooled up. I just slightly lifted it at the edge, and the water rolled off. It would work great for damp sports fields. It’s a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: C. Venable

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a quick trip to the beaches of Clearwater Fl. It was lightweight and easy to pack in the suitcase and the blanket size was much larger than expected. The corner pockets filled with sand worked perfectly as anchors to keep the blanket from blowing away with the ocean breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P

customer_reviews.title: Wind is an issue
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Love the size and material. Two large adults fit easily and there was still room for our beach stuff. CONS: It was an average windy day at the beach and even with the four corners staked in the sand AND the pockets weighted down with sand, it still got caught in the wind and we lost 2 out of the 4 metal stakes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the beach!!
customer_reviews.text: Having this for my Hawaii trip was absolutely amazing and made my trips to the beach with my girlfriend so easy! Water repellent, extremely easy to dust sand off, lightweight, and very compact to travel with. So happy I purchased this and will definitely use it every time I go to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Blanket is great and serves it's purpose. Nice and big, light but durable, easy to fold, and easy to travel with. Gave only a 4 star because the "aluminum" anchors to hold the ends in place are not strong enough and bend easily. If you are in just sand, they pull up or move and in grass/dirt, top of stake is not long enough to step on and push in, and when you can with your hand or foot, they bend very easily. Seems like the manufacturer would have made them a harder metal and the top longer for ease of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Korson

customer_reviews.title: Better than Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just a wonderful product. Light as a feather, rolls or folds into the size of a WonderBread loaf. Included an iPhone water proof, clear plastic container thru which you can take clear photos and carry on a clear conversation. Just great
customer_reviews.author: Umass Spot

customer_reviews.title: Multi Use DURABLE blanket
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to lie on so the sand didn't blow on us while at the beach. What exceeded my expectations were the other uses we found for it: As a shade cloth, as a rain poncho in a surprise downpour and as a car seat cover so we didn't get suntan oil all over the seats! It washes up good as new and stores so small. This should be in everyone's beach bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a thin, LARGE, nylon area for our kids to spread out at the beach.
customer_reviews.text: Like many have said, this is a thin nylon sheet more than a blanket. So dont expect it to be super plush or soft. Afterall, you are sitting on sand. But it is very large, plenty of space to lay out, and have kids toys, cooler, towels, etc. That said, we took and used ours multiple days at the beach. Packing and Unpacking was a breeze. I had different expectations when understanding how the blanket doesnt collect sand. I had to lift one side of the blanket and the sand that collected slid off. Pretty easy, but I was thinking it would "sift" the sand.
customer_reviews.author: JJHjr

customer_reviews.title: Sand does not slip through this, stays on just like any other blanket or sheet.
customer_reviews.text: "Sand free" is really not accurate. Sand does not slip through this blanket, its parachute material. Large, lightweight, easy to fold but if sand gets on it, there it stays. You need to fill the pockets with sand to keep it down or use the stakes.
customer_reviews.author: IveGotSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for a single parent
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a quick and simple blanket to pull out of your beach bag and lay on the sand, this is not it. I looked for a water resistant beach blanket, and this seems ideal. However, I have two toddlers and often take them to the beach on my own. This took me far too long to set up and my kiddos would not stop pulling the stakes out. In another circumstance I’m sure it’s great, but for someone with kids who just wants something quick and simple, this is not the best blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Loved this!  Used it every days for 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this Blanket! Lightweight, easy to fold back into its self contained bag. We used it everyday on the beaches of Hawaii. It fit 4 of us, with all our stuff and lots of room to spare. If it gets wet it drys in minutes. The stakes came in handy and worked perfectly on the windy beaches. You could tell many of the other beach goers were jealous!
customer_reviews.author: Verner

customer_reviews.title: FUN AT BIKE NIGHT LAWN PARTYS
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, I purchase one for carrying on my Harley, pack small, perfect for grass ,sand and H-D bike nights, wish the colors were orange and black, would love to have ties for a little shade, would I recommend to a friend Well, they tried to take mine at bike night Love it perfect for the lawn Five stars ⭐️ from me
customer_reviews.author: Cool ray

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, huge and comfortable fabric
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Will buy another one for a friend. I bought this for a picnic party, but soon realized it will be our favorite beach blanket. It is so lightweight and easy to carry! We were amazed at how large the blanket is. The stakes (included in purchase) held it in place all day in the wind at the park. The wet grass did not come through the blanket. My friends all asked the brand to buy one as well! Really more than I expected. It even folds up super easy and goes right into the attached pouch. Great purchase. CAN'T WAIT TO USE IT ON THE BEACH! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Beth

customer_reviews.title: Just what I have been waiting for
customer_reviews.text: I have seen this many times and finally purchased it. It has been great. Its especially strong and with the sand pockets stays put even in a big wind. The whole family can convene on this without the sandy mess. Perfect to sit in a group and play a game or chat. Packing up is a breeze too, just shake it off and stuff back into the small sack. Bonus...If you have a chair with a pocket on the back like mine it fits in there with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Highintensity

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Whether taking a picnic to the vineyard, a concert in the park, or a day on the beach, I always looked for a spread to keep everything clean and dry. I ordered this just before my recent beach trip, and I'm thrilled with the purchase. It was a very windy day but the pockets held sand and kept everything in-place even better than I anticipated. And it was easy to shake off the sand and store it right back into the attached storage pocket. This blanket will be a constant for all of my outdoor hang-out events.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: My best amazon purchase
customer_reviews.text: this beach blanket is AWESOME. It’s BIG. The sand comes right off. It’s super easy to fold! I love that it came with a waterproof bag for your phone. What a nice bonus! I got the pink one and love the color. Buy! You won’t regret it !
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Contreras

customer_reviews.title: More than enough room!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the beach blanket for a trip to Florida with the girls, and I can say it was amazing! It fit nicely into my suitcase for the airplane, super easy to set up. And I was amazed at how easy it was to fold back up into the bag. A little sand got on the blanket, but it was easy to brush off. Cant go to the beach and not expect to get sand on you! The waterproof phone carrier was a nice bonus too! I would definitely recommended the beach blanket to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sara D.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, Compact & Functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beach sheet. I would not call it a blanket because it is very thin like windbreaker material. I saw someone had the purple one at the beach and had to have it. I purchased the blue and it’s just as beautiful as the purple. It’s really big so several people can lay down on it. And it packs up so compactly compared to a thick beach blanket, so it’s east to bring with you when you know you may be sitting on the ground at a concert or picnic. I might even get the purple!
customer_reviews.author: Shelagh Hafner

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: We used this down in Rocky Point and it was awesome. It packs up so small that it hardly takes up any space in the car for driving down there and then it is very easy to clean the sand off and pack back up. Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Big, light, not bulky, very easy to for all occasions.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7month old and 6 year old child. We totally love the size of the big blanket the light weight, clips on to your bag, how small it folds up, pegs to hold down the blanket, water resistant, easy with the sand, easy to wash, drys fast, etc. it was even raining and used it to shield my family. We only used this blanket 2 times and can’t wait to have more memories with it.thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Murata

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at how easy to stuff this into sack was!
customer_reviews.text: I am the worst packer and this was amazing! Love how big it is and can easily fit family of five. Also able to pack up in the same and wind. Win/win!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado girl

customer_reviews.title: Large and lightweight. Not sand free.
customer_reviews.text: It is large and lightweight. Not at all sand free. Like the other reviews said, it’s like parachute material. I’m. Happy enough with it but not sure I’ll use it tomorrow because of all the sand that got on it. Might as well sit/lay directly on the sand. Sand does easily shake off and packing it up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: OpenMindandMouth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lay out
customer_reviews.text: Used this in Florida multiple times this last month. Easy to lay out. Comfortable to lay on. Easy to roll up and repackage. The blanket even got wet from a rogue wave and we just lifted it and the water rolled right off. Great product, I would recommend to friends. Best of all takes up very little space when packing is tight.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Lou

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best purchase I've made for beach gear. Lightweight, huge, easy to fold, and the sand just falls right off. Folded corners that you can fill with sand for anchors were great, but the metal stakes were provided too; it wasn't going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: lifeisgood

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this beach blanket!! It’s super lightweight and stays down when it’s windy. Comes in a nice little carrying bag with stakes to keep it down:)
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: A must for any beach trip
customer_reviews.text: This beach blanket was perfect. It is light weight and can fit into tight spaces, it’s easy to spread out and putting the sand in the four corner pockets prevents it from blowing away. I was on a beach surrounded by people who marked there space with towels. However, between the wind blowing their towels, people walking by and accidentally moving them, some families lost their claimed space or at least a portion of it. With the beach blanket, your space is claimed once you put it down, not much is going to move it. Also, It doesn’t get hot in the sun and it is so easy to pack up. This is a great purchase, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lovztoread

customer_reviews.title: Good & Quality Blanket
customer_reviews.text: This WELLAX Outdoor Camping Blanket is great! Well constructed with quality material. Easy to clean with options to support it from blowing up with the wind. Easy to pack into the bag and compress it down.
customer_reviews.author: Blind woodcrafter

customer_reviews.title: Beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: We have used it at the beach this week - it’s been great!
customer_reviews.author: nancyejb

customer_reviews.title: Great Blanket but...
customer_reviews.text: Very large blanket. They say you can for 7 people on it, but in reality it’s probably 4. The sand does not completely disappear when it gets on top and need to shake it off. For water resistance, some people have laid on it and there was sweat on it after getting up in the hot sun, but dried up within 5min. Overall a good blanket for the family but wish the sand disappeared faster.
customer_reviews.author: checkersperson

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but durable
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a blanket I could take to sports games that would be easy to clean and easy to carry. I was hesitant when it arrived because it is in such a small package. Was pleasantly surprised when I unpacked it and realized how big it was. Even more surprised when I found it so it so easy to pack back into the carrying case. So lightweight that my one year old can carry it for me.
customer_reviews.author: FloydNSteff

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Repel Sand. Cheap Material. Embeds sand particles.
customer_reviews.text: Not actually sand repelling. Sand becomes ingrained / embedded in the material when you sit on it. And the sand won't come out without a deep wash. Bad quality material. Not actually "sand free", unlike other, better "sand free" blankets with better quality material, which you can just shake the sand off.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Stringham

customer_reviews.title: A family-sized blanket, for sure!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! Much larger than I anticipated. Dirt, leaves, and grass easily wipe or brush off. Super easy to fold back into the storage bag as well. We bought it for the beach but have used it for backyard picnics more times than I can count.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WELLAX Sandfree Beach Blanket - Huge Ground Cover 9' x 10' for 7 Adults - Best Sand Proof Picnic Mat for Travel, Camping, Hiking and Music Festivals - Durable Tarp with Corner Pockets
feature_bullets: NO MORE MESS – Say goodbye to all that annoying sand which sticks to your regular beach blanket ! Brush off all the sand with no effort! It’s time to enjoy a Sand Free chillaxing day on your WellaX Blanket!

OVERSIZED BUT COMPACT – At 9’ x 10’ your whole family or friends can take advantage and chill on this amazingly soft and HUGE blanket! The best part: it collapses to 4” x 8” and only weighs 16oz. The integrated sack makes it so EASY to store and carry around!

QUICK DRY NYLON FABRIC – Made from strong, durable and breathable 100% Parachute nylon, the WellaX blanket will last for years of use. Water repellent, anti-heat material makes it perfect for any occasion whether it is camping, hiking, a picnic day, a music festival experience or simply travelling!
STAY SAFE – The beach towel comes with four incorporated pockets preventing it from being carried away and a Universal Waterproof Case for your personal belongings.
NO RISK PURCHASE.- Making you a happy customer is our main goal. Just try it, and if you don’t absolutely Love it, send us a message and we will Refund or Replace your Purchase, NO QUESTIONS ASKED.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
